job_history.role_name: Director of National Sales- US. Healthcare
job_history.work_description: Responsible for leading and overseeing all national sales functions for healthcare segment consisting of medical gases, maintenance/certification services, and durable medical equipment. Develop strategies to improve customer experience while increasing sales margins within hospital, dental clinics, skilled nursing centers, medical equipment and healthcare services segments.
Responsible for overseeing all business development activity in northeast territory that included all customer activities, customer service, budgeting, forecasting, contract negotiation, and billing.

Responsible for managing all aspects of engineering business development and sales for Delaware and New Jersey to medical device, pharmaceutical, industrial manufacturing, electronic manufacturing, and R&D organizations.

skills.name: Sales Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in leading and overseeing national sales functions, developing strategies, and managing sales teams, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing business development activities, including customer service, budgeting, forecasting, contract negotiation, and billing, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Proven track record of leading teams and overseeing national sales functions, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Strategy Development
skills.explanation: Developed strategies to improve customer experience and increase sales margins, suggesting strong proficiency in strategy development.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Overseen customer service activities and developed strategies to improve customer experience, indicating strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed budgeting responsibilities as a National Accounts Manager, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Contract Negotiation
skills.explanation: Handled contract negotiation as a National Accounts Manager, indicating a solid working proficiency in contract negotiation.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Graduated with a degree in Marketing, but no direct experience in marketing roles, suggesting some practical experience.
